# ENG10-Group-Project
To save the code so everyone can see it you need Git downloaded and a github account.
Steps to get the repository:
    1) Click "code" the green button, and copy the link
    2) Open the git terminal and navigate to a directory that you want to clone it in
    3) Type "git clone" followed by the url
    4) Then you can open the file and make changes

Steps to save the file:
    1) Save like normal with ctrl + s
    2) Open the terminal again, navigate to the directory of the repo
    3) Type "git add .", then "git commit -m "any message you want" "
    4) Finally "git push", if this fails it probably means you don't have access, just dm me and i'll add you
